text: University of Rome may refer to: * Sapienza University of Rome, founded in 1303 * Università Cattolica del Sacro Cuore, Rome satellite campus opened 1961 * University of Rome Tor Vergata, founded in 1982 * Roma Tre University, founded in 1992 * Foro Italico University of Rome, founded in 1998 ==See also== * Rome University of Fine Arts
title: University of Rome
